content:
path /v3/nft/transaction/tokenid/chain/tokenaddress/tokenid
operationid nftgettransactionbytoken
parameters
description the blockchain to work with
in path
name chain
required true
schema
type string
description nft token id
in path
name tokenid
required true
schema
type string
maxlength 78
format uint256
description address of the token smart contract
in path
name tokenaddress
required true
schema
type string
description max number of items per page is 50
in query
name pagesize
schema
type number
maximum 50
minimum 1
required true
description offset to obtain next page of the data
in query
name offset
schema
type number
description transactions from this block onwards will be included
in query
name from
schema
type number
minimum 0
description transactions up to this block will be included
in query
name to
schema
type number
minimum 0
summary get transactions for a specific nft
description 1 credit per api call get incoming and outgoing transactions for an nft this api is supported for the following blockchains  celo ethereum polygon
responses
200
schema
type array
nfttx
type object
properties
blocknumber
type number
description block number
txid
type string
description transaction id
contractaddress
type string
description contract address
tokenid
description id of the token
type string
maxlength 78
format uint256
from
type string
description sender
to
type string
description recipient
required
blocknumber
txid
contractaddress
tokenid
from
to
description ok
tag_summary:
nft stands for nonfungible token which means that each token is unique and irreplaceable nfts are described by the erc721 standard on the ethereum blockchain or by the equivalent standard on the other blockchains
nfts can be used for nearly any digital asset or good to ensure authenticity and scarcity for example

ingame assets nfts can be used to create unique collectibles in the form of characters weapons skins or other equipment players can resell or trade assets directly as they choose and their authenticity is easily verifiable
music and other digital media nfts can be used to create rare and unique collectible digital releases similarly nfts can be used to sell videos art or any other type of digital media collectors can own digital originals of their favorite songs movies and so on
digital sports merchandise trading cards memorabilia classic moments in sports history and oneofakind experiences can be sold as nfts

each nftrelated api its own set of the blockchains the list of the supported blockchains is provided in the api description further in this section
title: 34_NFT (ERC-721 or compatible)_NftGetTransactionByToken_332.json
